original_title: Haitink Faust - Berliner Philharmoniker: Beethoven Violin Concerto and Symphony No.6 "Pastoral"
overview: At the Easter Festival 2015 in Baden Baden the Berliner Philharmoniker were all over Beethoven. Under the baton of Bernard Haitink, who is regarded as an authority on the music of Beethoven, they played the famous Symphony No. 6 "Pastorale". For the Violin Concerto the Berliner Philharmoniker were joined by multi-awarded Isabelle Faust.
title: Haitink Faust - Berliner Philharmoniker: Beethoven Violin Concerto and Symphony No.6 "Pastoral"
